title: Riotatta banned me unjustly >:((((((((((((((
body:
[](https://i.gyazo.com/7ded933d5e7ad7af3393f39a4d1fadf0.png)

It's completely unfair to ban me for scripting, I only scripted in 125 ranked games, and I made sure to run it down mid so that my winrate would remain fair for the other players too, and I mean look at my chatlog and try to tell me where I said something banworthy

Game 1
Me: STFU F*****S
Me: KYS 0/2 Janna
Me: KYS 0 gank jungler
Me: KYS Killstealer vayne.
Me: STFU Akali
Me: KYS Akali
Me: Im afk go F*** urselves
Me: Report Akali Intentional feeding

So very clearly I was UNJUSTLY BANNED and Akali should've been banned, and I did the right thing by leaving the game before it escalated anymore so why did ritito ban me, I put a lot of cash into this account I have 15 rp and 1 skin and icon and Rioticate needs to give me back my account.

replies.body: there is gonna be 1 person who doesn't see this is in memes and games
I'm hoping the riotatta tips them off
sad joke sad post ... laughing of a real competitive player who is clearly getting matched with garbage and getting banned for being too good :(

he said "ez" to an ezreal.
He meant kys as kiss yourself clearly.  And why did he only get banned for scripting and toxicity.  Where the int feeding games just a bad game.

are you sure it doesn't mean "kiss your soulmate"?

I mean... Maybe he's Cupid.
Is this why I got the card that said "KYS" on Valentine's Day?
Riotatouille Games
Riotoli Riotoli give me the formuoli
"I even ate 108 black licorice jelly beans through a straw!  now why won't you give me the formula?!"
You should change the "me" in the post to your name because thats how the chat logs look when sent back to you
honestly I thought about that and decided to switch it over to me because I don't really want people to associate my name to ridiculous toxicity.

Why would we associate you with toxicity?
There's nothing wrong in the chatlogs.
\#freethemite #dianosaursdidnothingwrong

That was one of the references, but overall I'm just blasting that whole part of board culture.
you forgot that you were only banned cause you were reported by "toxic premades"
should've used a fighting type :^

That server is incredibly toxic. Thankfully there's always the mute button.

Wow, why would Riot report you? You seem like such a great guy... Riot is so weird sometimes with who they ban. They should just unlift your ban. While their at it, compensate you for it. Actually, compensate me for it because I brought up the idea. I think this is a fair deal.
